metadata.title: CVE-2017-13712 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in the id3v2AddAudioDuration function inlibmp3lame/id3tag.c in LAME 3.99.5 allows attackers to perform Denial ofService by triggering a NULL first argument.

criterions.comment: lame: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
